record.jsxtip: Fires when a key down event occurs on the text field.

record.jsxtext: the form field object that publishes this event.

record.jsxtip: Fires when a key up event occurs on the text field.

record.jsxtext: the form field object that publishes this event.

record.jsxtip: Fires when a key press event occurs on the text field.

record.jsxtext: the form field object that publishes this event.

record.jsxtip: Fires when the select box state changes.

record.jsxtext: the form field object that publishes this event.
the event that triggered this change.
the rendered GUI object that triggered this change.
the new value of the selection.
